page.title: 18Where We Live
page.content: We all live in terraced, detached or semi-detached houses or bungalows. I live in a semi-detached house on Lakeside Estate. We have a fairly large front garden but only a patio at at the back. The house has a lounge, a kitchen-diner and three bedrooms. My house is an individual detached house. It has a garden at the front and the rear. It contains three bedrooms, a lounge, a dining room, a big kitchen and porches at the front and the back. We have gas central heating and part double glazing. The garage is at the back. I live in a terraced house, that is, one where other houses are joined on to mine on both sides.The front door is on the street so we do not have a front garden. It is a two bedroomed house. We have an allotment nearby.
